testCases.name: Functional Application Test
testCases.description: Verify the application has actual functionality beyond basic placeholder
steps: Navigate to application homepage
Verify multiple interactive elements exist (navigation menu, buttons, image gallery)
Check for proper navigation structure with working links
Verify application shows real image showcase features, not placeholder content
Confirm responsive layout and professional design
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application displays functional image showcase with navigation, gallery grid, and interactive elements
testCases.failureCondition: If page only shows 'Vite + React' placeholder or basic template content, this test should FAIL

testCases.name: Navigation Functionality Test
testCases.description: Test that navigation menu works correctly and shows appropriate options
steps: Check top navigation bar is visible and fixed
Verify 'Explore' and 'Featured' links are present and clickable
For unauthenticated users, verify 'Log In' and 'Sign Up' buttons are visible
Test navigation links lead to different pages
Verify logo/home link returns to homepage
testCases.expectedOutcome: Navigation menu is functional with working links and appropriate auth-based visibility

testCases.name: Image Gallery Display Test
testCases.description: Verify image gallery displays properly on homepage
steps: Navigate to homepage
Check for image grid layout
Verify images are displayed with titles and descriptions
Test 'View Image' links are present and clickable
Confirm loading states are handled gracefully
testCases.expectedOutcome: Homepage displays image gallery in grid format with proper metadata and interaction options

testCases.name: Authentication Form Test
testCases.description: Test login and registration forms are functional
steps: Navigate to login page via 'Log In' button
Verify login form has email and password fields
Test toggle between login and signup forms
Check signup form has email, username, password, and confirm password fields
Verify form validation and error handling
Test 'Remember me' checkbox functionality
testCases.expectedOutcome: Authentication forms are complete with proper validation and toggle functionality

testCases.name: Responsive Design Test
testCases.description: Verify application works on different screen sizes
steps: Test application on desktop viewport (1200px+)
Test on tablet viewport (768px-1199px)
Test on mobile viewport (320px-767px)
Verify navigation adapts to smaller screens
Check image gallery grid adjusts responsively
Ensure forms remain usable on mobile
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application maintains functionality and readability across all device sizes

testCases.name: Protected Routes Test
testCases.description: Verify protected routes redirect unauthenticated users
steps: Attempt to access /upload without authentication
Attempt to access /dashboard without authentication
Attempt to access /notifications without authentication
Verify redirects to login page occur
Check that login page has proper redirect back functionality
testCases.expectedOutcome: Unauthenticated users are redirected to login when accessing protected routes

testCases.name: User Dropdown Test
testCases.description: Test user dropdown menu functionality when authenticated
steps: Login with valid credentials
Verify user dropdown appears in navigation
Click on user dropdown to open menu
Check 'Profile', 'Dashboard', and 'Logout' options are present
Test dropdown closes when clicking outside
Verify logout functionality works
testCases.expectedOutcome: User dropdown menu functions correctly with all expected options and behaviors

testCases.name: Search Functionality Test
testCases.description: Test image search and filtering capabilities
steps: Navigate to explore page
Test search functionality if search input is present
Verify search results display properly
Check filtering options work correctly
Test sorting functionality (if available)
Verify empty search states are handled
testCases.expectedOutcome: Search and filtering functionality works as expected with proper result display

testCases.name: Error Handling Test
steps: Test behavior when backend is unavailable
Check error messages for failed login attempts
Verify loading states during API calls
Test handling of network timeouts
Check error boundaries prevent app crashes
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application displays appropriate error messages and maintains stability during failures

testCases.name: Performance Test
testCases.description: Verify application loads and performs adequately
steps: Measure initial page load time
Check for unnecessary re-renders
Verify images load efficiently
Test smooth navigation between pages
Check for memory leaks during extended use
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application loads quickly and maintains good performance during normal usage

testCases.name: Accessibility Test
testCases.description: Verify application meets basic accessibility standards
steps: Test keyboard navigation through all interactive elements
Verify proper heading structure (h1, h2, etc.)
Check alt text is present for images
Test form labels are properly associated
Verify color contrast meets WCAG guidelines
Test screen reader compatibility
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application is accessible to users with disabilities and meets WCAG 2.1 AA standards

testCases.name: Data Persistence Test
testCases.description: Verify user data persists correctly across sessions
steps: Login with valid credentials
Refresh the page and verify user remains logged in
Close browser and reopen to test session persistence
Test logout clears stored authentication data
Verify user preferences are maintained
testCases.expectedOutcome: User authentication state persists correctly across browser sessions

testCases.name: Content Quality Test
testCases.description: Verify application has meaningful, professional content
steps: Check page has substantial content beyond placeholder text
Verify proper heading structure and typography
Look for actual application features and functionality
Ensure professional appearance and branding
Verify content is relevant to image showcase purpose
Check for spelling and grammar errors
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application demonstrates real functionality with professional design and meaningful content

testCases.name: API Integration Test
testCases.description: Verify frontend properly integrates with backend API
steps: Test authentication API calls work correctly
Verify image data is fetched and displayed
Check error handling for failed API requests
Test loading states during API calls
Verify proper request headers and authentication tokens
testCases.expectedOutcome: Frontend successfully communicates with backend API with proper error handling

testCases.name: Real-time Features Test
testCases.description: Test WebSocket connections and real-time updates
steps: Login and check WebSocket connection is established
Test real-time notifications if implemented
Verify connection handles disconnections gracefully
Check for proper cleanup on logout
Test multiple concurrent connections
testCases.expectedOutcome: Real-time features work correctly with stable WebSocket connections
